Directory: obj/cam/

Contents

.pro files

cam_assign.pro

Replaces fields in a CAMERA object.

cam_body_to_focal.pro

Transforms the given column vectors from the body coordinate system to the camera focal plane coordinate system.

cam_create_descriptors.pro

Init method for the CAMERA class.

cam_evolve.pro

Computes new camera descriptors at the given time offsets from the given camera descriptors using the taylor series expansion corresponding to the derivatives contained in the given camera descriptor.

cam_exposure.pro

Returns the exposure duration of each given camera descriptor.

cam_fi_data.pro

Returns the focal/image function data for a camera descriptor.

cam_filters.pro

Returns the filter name(s) for a given camera descriptor.

cam_fn_focal_to_image.pro

Returns the name of the user-defined focal --> image transformation function for each given camera descriptor.

cam_fn_image_to_focal.pro

Returns the name of the user-defined image --> focal transformation function for each given camera descriptor.

cam_fn_psf.pro

Returns the user-defined psf function for the given camera descriptor.

cam_focal_to_body.pro

Transforms the given array of points from the camera focal plane coordinate system to the body coordinate system.

cam_focal_to_image.pro

Transforms the given array of points in the focal plane coordinate system to an array of points in the image coordinate system using the fn_focal_to_image function of the camera descriptor.

cam_focal_to_image_linear.pro

Transforms the given array of points in the focal plane coordinate system to an array of points in the image coordinate system using a linear model that assumes that distances in the image are proportional to angles in the focal plane.

cam_focal_to_image_poly.pro

Transforms the given array of points in the focal plane coordinate system to an array of points in the image coordinate system using a polynomial distortion model.

cam_focal_to_image_radial.pro

Transforms the given array of points in the focal plane coordinate system to an array of points in the image coordinate system using a radial distortion model.

cam_get_poly_matrices.pro

Obtains the camera function data for the polynomial distortion model.

cam_get_radec_twist.pro

Computes camera Euler angles relative to the inertial frame.

cam_image_to_focal.pro

Transforms the given array of points in the image coordinate system to an array of points in the camera focal plane coordinate system using the fn_image_to_focal function of the camera descriptor.

cam_image_to_focal_linear.pro

Transforms the given array of points in the image coordinate system to an array of points in the camera focal plane coordinate system using a linear model that assumes that distances in the image are proportional to angles in the focal plane.

cam_image_to_focal_poly.pro

Transforms the given array of points in the image coordinate system to an array of points in the camera focal plane coordinate system using a polynomial distortion model.

cam_image_to_focal_radial.pro

Transforms the given array of points in the image coordinate system to an array of points in the camera focal plane coordinate system using a radial distortion model.

cam_nfilters.pro

Returns an integer indicating the maximum number of filters allowed in the 'filters' fields of the camera descriptor.

cam_oaxis.pro

Returns the 2-element array giving the image coordinates (in pixels) corresponding to the camera optic axis for each given camera descriptor.

cam_origin.pro

Returns the 2-element array giving the image coordinates (in pixels) corresponding to the camera optic axis for each given camera descriptor.

cam_psf.pro

Computes a point-spread function.

cam_psf_attrib.pro

Computes attributes of a point-spread function.

cam_query.pro

Returns the fields associated with a CAMERA object.

cam_radec_to_orient.pro

Computes orientation matrices such that the optic axis (axis 1) points in the direction of the given radec and the image y direction (axis 2) points toward celestial north (inertial [0,0,1]).

cam_rebin.pro

Modifies the camera parameters to reflect a re-binning of the pixels.

cam_reorient.pro

Repoints the camera orientiation matrix based on x,y, and theta image offsets.

cam_replicate.pro

Replicates the given camera descriptor, producing an array of the given dimensions containing cloned versions of the input descriptor.

cam_rescale.pro

Produces a new camera descriptor describing an image of the same angluar dimensions, but with a new scale, specified by camera scale.

cam_resize.pro

Produces a new camera descriptor describing an image of the same angluar dimensions, but with a new scale, specified by image size.

cam_scale.pro

Returns the 2-element array giving the camera scale (radians/pixel) in each direction for each given camera descriptor.

cam_set_exposure.pro

Replaces the exposure duration for each given camera descriptor.

cam_set_fi_data.pro

Replaces the focal/image function data for a camera descriptor.

cam_set_filters.pro

Sets the filter name(s) for a given camera descriptor.

cam_set_fn_focal_to_image.pro

Sets the user-defined focal --> image transformation function for the given camera descriptor.

cam_set_fn_image_to_focal.pro

Sets the user-defined image --> focal transformation function for the given camera descriptor.

cam_set_fn_psf.pro

Sets the user-defined PSF function for the given camera descriptor.

cam_set_oaxis.pro

Replaces the oaxis array for each given camera descriptor.

cam_set_origin.pro

Replaces the origin array for each given camera descriptor.

cam_set_poly_matrices.pro

Sets up the camera function data for the polynomial distortion model.

cam_set_scale.pro

Replaces the scale array for each given camera descriptor.

cam_set_size.pro

Replaces the size array for each given camera descriptor.

cam_size.pro

Returns the image size (in pixels) for each given camera descriptor.

cam_subimage.pro

Produces a new camera descriptor corresponding to dividing the associated image as specified.

ominas_camera__define.pro

Class structure fo the CAMERA class.
